creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: mountainscape: purple mountain range in background; flat terrain with rocks, boulders, and vegetation in foreground
marks: Left margin; vertical; Japanese inscription LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ainodake and Noutoridake
